plot: At the doctor's office, a father threatens his pre-teen son not to reveal the truth about his injury. When the son starts to draw, he envisions a twisted fantasy where the truth can't remain hidden.
title: Carnivore
plot_es: At the doctor's office, a father threatens his pre-teen son not to reveal the truth about his injury. When the son starts to draw, he envisions a twisted fantasy where the truth can't remain hidden.
plot_en: At the doctor's office, a father threatens his pre-teen son not to reveal the truth about his injury. When the son starts to draw, he envisions a twisted fantasy where the truth can't remain hidden.
